title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item is different from the format displayed in a data or text item.
OB: The datetime values displayed in the dynamic text item and data/text item have different formats.
EB: The datetime values should have the same format when displayed in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a text item and set its type to data or text. 
2. Insert a dynamic text item. 
3. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in both items. 
4. Compare the format of the datetime values in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
